page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: On Saturday's I get up at 9.00 and get dressed. I then go to the Kitchen to get my Breakfast and turn on the television. My Dad comes home from work at 10.30. Between 10.30 and midday I usually go and play with a friend. After 12.00 we often go shopping in Dudley, Wolverhampton or Telford. When we are out we sometimes go to 'McDonalds' for a Beefburger and a cup of cofee. We would get home by about 16.00. The Mum would make us some Sausages and Chips. Then I watch television. At about 20.30 we have a small for example snack;for example; Yogart or Sandwich. At 21.00 or 21. 00 I usually go to bed and read till its time to go to sleep.
